purpleculture_pinyin:
diāo
artful; wicked
хитрый; безнравственный
purpleculture_examples:
刁难 [ diāo nàn ]: to be hard on sb; to deliberately make things difficult
刁钻 [ diāo zuān ]: crafty; tricky
刁蛮 [ diāo mán ]: crafty and unruly
刁滑 [ diāo huá ]: artful; crafty
放刁 [ fàng diāo ]: to act wickedly; to bully; to make life difficult for sb by unreasonable actions
heisig_chinese_memo: Clothes hangers can be quite wily (skilled in deception) as you don't know if the clothes are still wet or if they don't have a single drop of wetness left.
Ru_trainchinese: diāo: (прил) хитрый, коварный; (диал.) разборчивый, придирчивый (в отношении еды)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Clothes hangers can be quite wily (skilled in deception) as you don't know if the clothes are still wet or if they don't have a single drop of wetness left.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: It looks like a "diao bucket", which represents an ancient marching tool. The bucket has a handle and is made of copper. It is used as a cooker during the day and patrols at night. "Historical Records-Biography of General Li": "When you attack Hu, and Guangxing has no army and no army, you will be good at water and grass, letting you stop, everyone can do it for themselves, and do not fight for self-defense." One book is "Sword Fight." Pei Qi's collection quoted Meng Kang as saying: "The copper is used as a squash device, and it is subjected to a fight. It cooks food during the day and holds it at night. The name is Diao Dou." Sima Zhensuo faintly quoted Xun Yueyun: "Diao Dou, Xiaoling, like a night bell from the palace."

" Diao " in modern Chinese means rogue and cunning. "Journey to the West" Chapter 83: "Dare to go to the heavenly king, afraid of what he didn't say and do, so let's let go of it and talk nonsense. How can you be discriminated against him."

" Diao " also means kidnapping and seduce. The third fold of Yuan Baipu's "Wall Touhou": "Msang Gong, when Brother Sheren bought flowers and plants seven years ago, it was this move that led to the future."
288 Characters
humanum_short_description_en: shaped like a "diao bucket", representing an ancient marching tool. The bucket has a handle and is made of copper. It is used as a cooking utensil during the day and used for patrol at night.
humanum_full_description:
象「刁斗」之形，表示一種古代行軍用具，斗形有柄，銅質，白天用作炊具，晚上擊以巡更。《史記‧李將軍列傳》：「及出擊胡，而廣行無部伍行陳，就善水草屯，舍止，人人自便，不擊刁斗以自衛。」一本作「刀斗」。裴駰集解引孟康曰：「以銅作鐎器，受一斗，晝炊飯食，夜擊持行，名曰刁斗。」一說鈴形。司馬貞索隱引荀悅云：「刁斗，小鈴，如宮中傳夜鈴也。」

　　近代漢語「刁」表示無賴、狡詐。《西游記》第83回：「天王那裏敢去，怕他沒的說做有的，放起刁來，口裏胡說亂道，怎生與他折辨。」

　　「刁」還表示拐騙、勾引。元白樸《墻頭馬上》第三摺：「相公，七年前舍人哥哥買花栽子時，都是這廝搬大引小着舍人刁將來的。」
288 Characters
humanum_short_description: 象「刁斗」之形，表示一種古代行軍用具，斗形有柄，銅質，白天用作炊具，晚上擊以巡更。

刁字的基本解释

刁
diāo
狡猾，无赖：刁棍。刁滑。
〔刁斗（
姓。d弖 ）〕古代军中用具，白天用来烧饭，夜间击以巡更。

diāo
I прил.
1) хитрый, коварный; злой, жестокий
这样儿刁妇女甭跟她惹气 не стоит связываться с такой коварной женщиной (задевать такую злую женщину)
2) дурной; несправедливый; порочный, развратный
刁讼 необоснованный иск
刁僧 порочный (развратный) монах
刁徒 дурной (порочный) человек
刁风俗 порочные нравы
3) быть разборчивым в еде
II собств.
Дяо (фамилия)
